Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Grounding

A lamp hanging over head The overcast sky outside The felt cap across the desk A man in the seat aside across from me The clock 9:19 an hour behind

Paper scrunching, crackling Fans, the AC? humming Keypresses tapping

The textured chiclet keyboard On my wrist, smooth greenwood beads Soft dry socks warm my feet

Coffee stale on my tongue

Previous: GearsNext: Three Mothers
Author
@Molossus Spondee
